title: (x) several typefaces - various {gang}
content:
Does anyone familiar with these typefaces? I’d like know what they’re called, please help!  
Thank you!

comments.content:
I’ll pick off the easy ones.

03 Univers?  
04 Helvetica Condensed, Helvetica  
05 Gill Sans

- Lex
No answer yet, but 01 and 02 are the same.

01 and 02 look like Klavika

or something close…

the first one is Hermes Thin

[http://www.itcfonts.com/fonts/font/pid/409268/Hermes+Thin/detail](http://web.archive.org/web/20070211005126/http:/www.itcfonts.com/fonts/font/pid/409268/Hermes+Thin/detail)
